# scbp

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

scbp is boilerplate code for single cell analyses. Mostly thin wrappers on seurat functions. 

## Installation

``` r
remotes::install_github(rnabioco/scbp)
```


## Example

```{r example}
library(scbp)
library(Seurat)

so <- Seurat::pbmc_small

plot_tsne(so, "groups")
plot_tsne(so, "CST3")

plot_features_split(so, 
                    "CST3",
                    "groups", 
                    embedding = "tsne")

plot_features_split(so, 
                    "RNA_snn_res.1",
                    "groups", 
                    embedding = "tsne", 
                    minimal_theme = TRUE,
                    )

get_metadata(so)
```
